mapper.select: SELECT a.orderIdx ,a.midx ,a.proIdx ,a.orderCount ,a.orderPrice ,b.proName ,b.proPrice ,b.proContents ,b.proImg FROM shop_product_order a LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product b ON a.proIdx = b.proIdx WHERE midx = #{midx} ORDER BY a.orderIdx DESC limit 1
